title: Amazon Essentials Men's Long Sleeve Shirts Casual - Regular-Fit Pocket Oxford
description: REGULAR FIT: Enjoy a comfortable and easy fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist with our men's dress shirts
COTTON OXFORD FABRIC: Made from 100% cotton oxford shirting, this long sleeve shirt combines softness and durability, standing up to regular use while offering a refined look
VERSATILE STYLE: With classic details, our men's oxford long sleeve shirt provides a timeless look
CLASSIC DESIGN: Our long sleeve button down shirts for men have a button-down collar and a patch pocket
FEATURES: Our men's long sleeve shirts feature adjustable button cuffs, a back yoke with a box pleat, and a rounded hem

Made from soft, durable 100% cotton, our men's oxford shirts offer an easy fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist for comfort throughout the day. The button-down collar, adjustable button cuffs, and back yoke with box-pleat detail enhance the shirt's classic styling, making it ideal as both a dress shirt for men and a casual staple. The practical patch pocket and rounded hem add subtle touches to these shirts.
